text.tspan: goal to pass a level? get x amount of treasure
you are attacked by a company of dwarves. what do you do?
random events - wood elf attack, unicorn siting, troll encounter,
dwarf trader encounter, mysterious old man encounter
dungeon - change to be injured, but also to find treasure
how to make money? trading between shops and encounters,
winning in combat, and finding it in dungeon chests.
unlockable special attack: flight / fire breath
trader in debt - must pay up x amount ina certain amount of turns, otherwise you fail the level
